name: funval
description: Functional validation schemas with built-in TypeScript support.

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.mocha:coverage: nyc npm run mocha && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test: npm run type-check && npm run lint -- --quiet && npm run mocha
scripts.coverage: npm run type-check && npm run lint -- --quiet && npm run mocha:coverage
scripts.test:commit:
if [[ -z "$(git status --untracked-files=no --porcelain)" ]]; then
  echo "All filed committed."
else
  echo "Uncommitted changes found. Please Commit them first." && exit 1
fi
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:commit && npm run test:build
scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags

author: Moshe Simantov <me@moshe.io>
